Representation + Joe's Pub

Apr 8, 2015 • Yohan Belmin

Dear friends,

Just a quick email from me, as this new month begins.

I’m glad to say that I started freelancing with Sandy Gunar from Avanti Talent Management. Still moving forward and getting better exposure, one step at a time.

And most importantly my roommate Joseph Spinelli will be singing at Joe’s Pub on Sunday night as part of Paying the RENT! with Anthony Rapp and other great Broadway names. This concert will be a fundraising for their upcoming production of RENT at the 2015 Edinburgh Fringe. Promo code for Sunday is RENT12. You’re welcome ;)

Be well and see you soon!
